post.body: blue-sky hosting! http://tinyurl.com/9ynf4c SEeeeen!
http://www.itvlocal.com/ : example of a UK map with some roll over action!
just got home from wk! BLAP. Addict online-store manager has sent an email to http://www.atelier-studios.com/. regarding my case study!
worked on mood boards , and did a lot of research into site layout design! looking forward to getting some more useful links from Petter!
That ive been working on in illustrator! oh yeah and swin ive found good file of logo!
Created Sis Project group on the Ning!- just posted a new top nav design idea!
Just been working on some drop down menu designs, found a useful tool @http://www.opencube.com/...
Have just emailed my work in progress to everyones winchester account. Big Respect to Matt , All the best Sir!!!
Unreal web site _ http://www.vw.com.br/fox/ serious creative thinking outside the box! what an amazing concept!
re - jog your j query memories @ http://jquery.com/demo/thickbox/
check out this blog http://www.formfiftyfive.com/ about design from around the world- really cool stuff!
Just completed a home-page design! night night!!! zzzzzzzzzzzzz
You will pay for your miss placed faith in the dark side! The Empire will Strike back, there will be a new hope and the jedijow will return
Oh how little you know of the force!! The dark side of the twitts has no chance with the force of the rebel alliance. It is over already!!!
Watching petter Video , about uploading checklists!
Ah it appears Nickolarse " the king of twitts " is looking for a twitt off!! Stand easy sir, you will look foolish!! I am twitter Over Lord.
The use of parallel design V. effective! Collaboration of Ben's and My wireframe/navigation concepts-makes for a much stronger concept !
Have an Idea of how our wireframe may look - on A3 paper pinned up on board. Now going to work on designing a digital home page template.
Having a look at In-design!
Completed an initial site map on white board ! Ready for some parallel design before meeting thurs to propose design solutions..
Watching the SIS videos we received in the post today!
Here is an Interesting way of publishing work digitally : http://issuu.com/
http://www.guardian.co.uk/media/digitalmedia _ guardian have a digitalMedia section on their site! keep up to date in all things digital.
http://blog.mainframe.co.uk/ "THE WONDER CABINET" mainframes blog site!
http://stores.homestead.com/DaydreamNetworkLtd/StoreFront.bok : A company who run a creative magazine- each page is a different Artist!
Working on my case study! listening to a Part time heroes podcast - real good music!! http://www.myspace.com/theparttimeheroes
Anni Mac smashed it playing through - funky breaks, baseline, house, drum n bass and dup step! wicked dj!!
Going to See Anni Mac Tonight!
Recieved an email back from Atelier (CaseStudy) suggesting will be happy to help me if I give them more scope on my project!
Have posted some key points (on Ning Sis Group) for us to remember when designing.. CHECK IT OUT YO!!!
In the digi Media Studio! Just been to get free Domino's from Uni Bar! Been re-reading Brand Document!Very Important stuff!
plus created a working side nav drop down to show, using the 'links' section of 'services' as example!
just completed a home page design!!! kinda happy wiv it too, so hoping y'all will feel it!
Off home now! going to continue work on side nav drop down design examples and home page layouts!
case study presentation went ok, bit annoyed about having to rush as room booked up! would have liked more feedback!
Is watching Elf! Dj ing at the cricketers pub this eve from 9pm!
Went to Winter wonderland today @ hyde park corner.Propa Crimbo!! http://www.hydeparkwinterwonderland.com/
Finished written proposal, but have to work wed afternoon and all day thurs now! so no ddm xmas dinner for me :(
http://twitpic.com/tioc - Just checking out twitpic
Good Day today, really helpful to get feedback on all the design ideas! Seems like we on point with site structure!
